meanings.definition: The quality or state of being shiny.
meanings.sent1: The little girl admired the shininesses of her new toy.
meanings.sent2: The car's shininesses made it stand out in the parking lot.
meanings.sent3: The shininesses of the glittery dress caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The sun reflected off the shininesses of the lake like a mirror.
meanings.sent5: The diamond's shininesses sparkled in the candlelight.

meanings.definition: The shininesses of the polished metal caught the sunlight.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully maintained the shininesses of the sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler's display case showcased the shininesses of the rings.
meanings.sent3: The detective was intrigued by the shininesses of the mysterious object.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight revealed the hidden shininesses of the ancient artifact.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's costume added extra shininesses to the performance.
